messages.title: Uniting Our Community
messages.content: If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation, if you want to stop the big polluters destroying our environment Vote Labour on 12 December.

messages.title: Make Sure Your Vote Counts
messages.content: The only poll that matters is the one on election day. The people of Putney, Roehampton and Southfields deserve a new MP who will be on your side, fighting for you in Parliament.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Upgrade our energy, transport and digital infrastructure.

mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want to stop Brexit, a vote for anything other than Labour is a wasted vote. Justine Greening, elected here as a Conservative at the last election is not standing again because she couldn’t tolerate Boris Johnson’s reckless Brexit. The Conservative candidate here is Boris Johnson’s yes man. The only way he can win is if the Remain vote splits. Only a vote for Labour will stop the Conservatives winning here.

community.content: If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation.

leaflet.personalStatement: If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation, if you want to stop the big polluters destroying our environment Vote Labour on 12 December.

examples: Putney, Roehampton and Southfields GE 2017 CONSERVATIVE MAJORITY OF 1,554

If you want to live in a society that works for everybody, if you want to save our hospitals, schools and public services from cuts and privatisation, if you want to stop the big polluters destroying our environment Vote Labour on 12 December.
We can't allow Brexit to continue to divide our society for another three years. This is the time to stand up and be counted. I am a proud Remainer and believe that we are stronger together.
It’s time to take the decision out of the hands of politicians. Labour’s position on Brexit is clear: let the people have the final say.
Labour is the only party that can and will deliver a public vote.

With our plans to end the public sector pay cap, scrap Universal Credit, and lower the voting age to 16, Labour will create a more fair and equal society where we move forward together, with nobody left behind.
The only poll that matters is the one on election day.
The people of Putney, Roehampton and Southfields deserve a new MP who will be on your side, fighting for you in Parliament.
Justine Greening, elected here as a Conservative at the last election is not standing again because she couldn’t tolerate Boris Johnson’s reckless Brexit.
If you want to save our hospitals, Vote Labour on 12 December.
£250bn - Upgrade our energy, transport and digital infrastructure.
We can't allow Brexit to continue to divide our society for another three years.
The Conservative candidate here is Boris Johnson’s yes man.
Justine Greening, elected here as a Conservative at the last election is not standing again because she couldn’t tolerate Boris Johnson’s reckless Brexit.
